title: Why the Blood Moon game mode is the best game mode to be made
body:
I just want to offer my opinion as to why the new Blood Moon mode is the best mode to be realesed to this day. 

1. the lack of health and tank items in a fun mode is really nice instead of someone just playing a full tank and ruining the fun
2. there are no tank items
3. still no tank items
4. there are no tank items
5. read number 1

I wish that all rotating game modes would include this "no tank" feature and instead allow all champions to build full damage and have more fun.
